answers.answer: Idk if this helps but at 27w5d he was measuring 2.13... And the dr said everything with his weight was normal.
Makes me feel a little better lol but still crazy I measure 5 weeks ahead even time I go. In lol
My friend that's due two days before me, she got her ultrasound at 28 weeks she measured 2.4, the doc said she was a little underweight!

I think you're just fine, there no reason to stress (: that doesn't sound awfully big my daughter was about 3bs when I was 30 weeks. And besides, doctors arent super accurate with the weight all the time, its more of a guesstimate
I just went for a sono yesterday im 31 weeks & he weighed 8 pounds 14 ounces an they said thats right where he should be
At my 29 week ultrasound my baby was 2lb she said that's good lol I think they just say oh it's good when it comes to weight of baby

My Dr just keeps repeating how big the baby is she doesn't seem worried I asked her if it was bad she laughed and said depends on how Good of a pusher I am.. mybe I'm just reading in to it too much. I will feel better after the diabetes test results come in.

@30wks ob said she was weighing @2lbs idnt remember the oz & according to the ultrasound im measuring a wk behind. But Ob isnt concerned. My 1st (grl) weighed 6lbs w.12oz @birth 40wks. & my 2nd (boy) weighed 5lbs w.14oz @birth 36wks.

Idk lol at 23 weeks my son was 1 pound 8 ounce...im 28 weeks and 3 days..next appointment Thursday! !! Ill let u know but my first son weighed 8 pounds 10 ounces..so i know hes not goibg to be small.. i wasnt a diabetic either!

question: I was told I measure 31 weeks and my baby is 2 lbs should I worrie that something is wrong? My other two kids whete 6.11 and 6.13 at birth dr said this one will be huge. My main worrie is Gestational diabetes but I go in tomorrow for that test
title: 26 weeks with a 2 lb baby
